text: We're having a issue where email tracking isn't working on a very large custom module; we get the "clipped" warning but once we go to view the supposed clip the e-mail is there and fine; has anyone ran into this? Does HubSpot automatically not insert tracking if there's a supposed error?

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-tracking-to-personalized-links-in-email/idi-p/773313>

saw this and it says HubSpot can't track dynamic links? is that true
Are you referring to the email being clipped at the bottom in Gmail?
yeah but its acutally not; I think theres something funky with dynamic links

There is a 102kb code file size limit in Gmail, so it clips the bottom of the email at that point. HubSpot does have a warning in the editor if this might happen.

ESPs usually insert tracking at the bottom of the email, HubSpot is one of them, so if the tracking pixel image doesn't get loaded, because the email is clipped, then it won't track an "open".
yeah its just weird cuz it tracks every other click except for two dynamic links
Then I think what you posted after this from the Community is correct. Have you tried the solution provided there?
Not yet, was asking for someone else! :slightly_smiling_face: but thank you for the help
